item.title: Report X-2024101213
item.description:
Report X-2024101213

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-15
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO KGS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING FOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 853E2X, CHOANIES BAKERY, 605 HAZEL ST, LEBANON PA 17042-60034. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024101218
item.description:
Report X-2024101218

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-14
  • City: MIDDLETOWN
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/14/2024 at approximately 1530, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 475356 at the ramp faclity in Middletown, reporting undeclared dangerous goods. This is a multiple piece shipment that consists of 6 fiberboard boxes, each containing one 44 lb. bag of pigment . One of the labels on the outer packages identifies the inner contents as "DCL Quindo Magenta" and displays a GHS corrosive mark. Dangerous Goods Administration acquired an online safety data sheet, which classified the commodity as UN 1263 Paint. Further inspection of the packages confirmed this classification. None of the packages displayed the required markings, labeling, packaging and paperwork that were in accordance with IATA Regulations. The shipment is being held for an FAA investigation.

item.title: Report E-2024100348
item.description:
Report E-2024100348

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-16T09:16:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-20
  • City: NORTH HUNTINGDON
  • State: PA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1627 ET, XPO-XPB notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported approximately 3 ounces of Armour last 1 released from a 5-gallon metal pail due to improper packaging. The release impacted inside trailer#311-7093. XPO informed us this was already cleaned up and placed into a 10-gallon metal drum along with Oil-Dri. The waste is staged for terminal personnel to manage.
